public class GoldCard extends PlayableCard
Class to manage the Gold Cards in the game

      Current cost of the GoldCard to be placed in the Market

    • goldCardType

      private final GoldCardType goldCardType
      GoldCardType of the GoldCard, it can be ResourceGoldCard, CoveredAngleGoldCard, or InstantGoldCard. It is used to calculate the total points made by the player after placing the gold card.

    • getInstantPoints

      public int getInstantPoints(Player player, Location location)
      This method returns the points of the card based on GoldCardType.
      Overrides:
      getInstantPoints in class PlayableCard
      Parameters:
      player - the player that placed the gold card and that will gain the points.
      location - the location of the card placed in the grid.
      Returns:
      The total points made by the player after placing the gold card.
